name: Harvest Minute
description:
You just wanted to be a laid-back farmer and earn your living growing parsnips,

but strangely if you forget to water one single plant the day starts anew, resetting your field, but not your tools lying around.

Water all your plants, sow new ones and harvest them when they are ripe and sell them using your shipping box.

Controls:

Keyboard

- WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

- L/C - Pickup/Drop

- K/X - Use held item

- ENTER  - Skip to end of day

Xbox Controller

- D-PAD - Move

- A - Pickup/Drop

- B - Use held item

- Start - Skip to end of day

The Analog Sticks are not supported

Pickup tools first before you can use them.

Use the seedbag to sow additional plants.

Water your plants with the watering can, you can get multiple at the water patch.

If not all plants are watered, your field will reset, but not your tools.

Pickup your harvest when they are ripe (once you see white on the plant)

and drop them in to the shipping box.

Harvest and sell as many as you can in 7 days!

Audio does NOT work in Safari, but should everywhere else (except IE of course)

Made in 72 hours with my own engine tako,

for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop

Thanks for playing!

Tips:

Exploit the day loop mechanic to prepare tools you need where you need them.

Ripe plants also need water.

But harvested crops don't need to be watered.

You don't have to sell the crop on the same day you harvested it.

It's possible to sell at least 30 parsnips!
